## SchemaValue type

`related` calls need to know what the available relationships are. The `schema` type encodes this information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type SchemaValue<T = unknown> = StringColumn | StringColumnOptional | NumberColumn | NumberColumnOptional | BooleanColumn | BooleanColumnOptional | NullColumn | NullColumnOptional | JsonColumn | JsonColumnOptional | EnumColumn<T> | EnumColumnOptional<T> | CustomColumn<T> | CustomColumnOptional<T>;
```
